channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Ariana Grande opting out of dynamic pricing might actually help ticket scalpers — and not her fans
item.description: Though consumers often assume they lose out with dynamic pricing, experts say that’s not always the case.

item.title: Trump touts TikTok deal but doesn’t address fear that China ‘retains a veto’
item.description: Here’s the latest on the Trump administration’s agreement with China on TikTok.

item.title: Taylor Swift tries to save the movie industry again with ‘Showgirl’ film release
item.description: “Taylor Swift: The Official Release Party of a Showgirl” will hit theaters on Oct. 3, the same day her upcoming album drops.

item.title: Stocks tend to suffer in the second half of September — but the Fed’s rate cut might keep bears at bay
item.description: History suggests it could be a downhill ride for stocks through the end of September.

item.title: Is the revamped American Express Platinum card worth the $895 fee? This new perk may seal the deal.
item.description: American Express is seeking to address longstanding customer complaints that it is difficult to track statement credits.

item.title: Top small-cap analyst DeSanctis raises forecast for Russell 2000, saying 'don't fight the Fed'
item.description: Small-cap stocks may see even more gains in their future after hitting recent highs this week, according to Jefferies' Steven DeSanctis.

item.title: NBA star Kevin Durant can't unlock his Coinbase bitcoin account. His agent is thrilled
item.description: Houston Rockets star forward Kevin Durant can't access his Coinbase account or the bitcoin held there. His agent says that's a good thing.

item.title: SEC to propose rule change on Trump's call to end quarterly earnings reporting, says Chair Atkins
item.description: Atkins said if the rule change is approved, it will be left to companies to decide whether they switch to semiannual or stay with quarterly.

item.title: Kevin Durant has access restored to his Coinbase bitcoin account, after years of being locked out
item.description: Kevin Durant has regained access to his Coinbase account containing bitcoins.

item.title: The chart on UPS has become so bad that it's good, says Carter Worth
item.description: Chart strategist Carter Worth breaks down the technical outlook on UPS.
